author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Update svnmerge.py's merge info for the
previous merge of r21561 from trunk.

author: dlr
msg: * subversion/libsvn_subr/hash.c
(svn_hash_clear): Add some inline comments describing how r21564
fixed the comilation problem introduced in r21561 with pre-1.3.0
versions of APR.

author: lgo
msg: Follow up to r21568: the original test was not the correct reproduction
recipe of issue 2468. Fixed it so that status -uN is run over the correct
folder.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/stat_tests.py
(status_nonrecursive_update): run status -uN over wc_dir/A instead of
wc_dir.

author: lgo
msg: Added XFail test for issue #2468: check if status -uN also reports out-of-date info when ran from outside a changed folder.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/stat_tests.py
(status_nonrecursive_update): New test
(test_list): run the new test, mark as XFail till the issue is fixed.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Fix merge test #36 to acount for the
Merge Tracking housekeeping property.
(This commit also accidentally included a stray "return" statement
which was subsequently removed in r21589.)
* subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(merge_conflict_markers_matching_eol): Expect to have 'prop
modified' at target root.
Patch by: Kamesh Jayachandran <kamesh@collab.net>
